title: Update one post-login splash message text

requirements.text: Replace the specific post-login splash message string "Document. Report. Prosecute. Repeat." with "Pervert. Stalker. Loser. Typical man." in the fixed splash message pool used by the post-login splash screen.

quotes: can you change just this one to Pervert. Stalker. Loser. Typical man.

acceptanceCriteria: The string "Document. Report. Prosecute. Repeat." no longer appears in POST_LOGIN_SPLASH_MESSAGES.
The post-login splash screen can display the new message "Pervert. Stalker. Loser. Typical man." as one of the randomized splash messages.
No other splash messages are changed.

constraints: Do not modify any other post-login splash messages besides the single specified line.
Keep all user-facing text in English.
nonGoals: Changing the splash screen layout, styling, images, or randomization behavior.
Adding new messages beyond replacing the one specified message.
